page.title: 20EVENTS
page.content: A man suspected of triple murder and other crimes was arrested in our area on November 5th 1984 after an exciting police chase. The suspect, who was subsequently tried and found guilty, lived on a nearby estate and because he knew the countryside well survived for a number of days in various hiding places. Several pupils of Brierton School remember the events surrounding his capture. One recalled seeing coach loads of police arriving and surrounding the Brierton area. Some of the police were armed and they marched up the lane to the quarry. Another pupil thought he saw the suspect in the fields before his arrest and was questioned by the police about what he had seen.
